member.name: T:Xunit.DataAttributes.Bases.EmbeddedResourceDataAttribute
member.summary: Base class for xUnit data attributes that extract data from one or more embedded resources in assemblies.

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Bases.EmbeddedResourceDataAttribute.UseAsRegex
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified resource names are regular expressions.

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Bases.EmbeddedResourceDataAttribute.Assembly
member.summary: The assembly to load the resources from. If not specified, this defaults to the currently executing assembly.

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Bases.EmbeddedResourceDataAttribute.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the character encoding to use when loading the resource data.

member.name: P:Xunit.DataAttributes.Bases.EmbeddedResourceDataAttribute.DetectEncoding
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to automatically detect the character encoding when loading the resource data.

member.name: M:Xunit.DataAttributes.Bases.EmbeddedResourceDataAttribute.GetData(System.String,System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Given the resource content, deriving classes should override this method to extract the required data and return as an IEnumerable<object[]>
member.param: The content of the resource, as a string.

member.name: T:Xunit.DataAttributes.EmbeddedResourceAsJsonAttribute
member.summary: Provides a data source for a data theory, with the data coming from one or more assembly embedded resources, where each resource is a JSON structure that can be deserialized into the specified type.

member.name: T:Xunit.DataAttributes.EmbeddedResourceContentAttribute
member.summary: Provides a data source for a data theory, with the data coming as the content of one or more assembly embedded resources.

member.name: T:Xunit.DataAttributes.EmbeddedResourceLinesAttribute
member.summary: Provides a data source for a data theory, with the data coming from one or more assembly embedded resources, where each data item is a single line in the embedded resource content.
